name: Flickr title above photo, expand photostream
description: LATEST VERSION: style 82074 In June 2010, Flickr made some radical design changes to the photo page that were, on the whole, excellent. There were just a few things that bothered me, which I described here: http://www.flickr.com/photos/fjordaan/4731650184/in/set-465611/ This stylesheet items 2 and 4 on my list: (1) Reinstate title above photo (2) Keep the 'photostream' film strip permanently open. (It's currently hidden when you come from a different context, such as Contacts or Favorites.) See also my stylesheet for reinstating the button bar: style 37282 Report any issues on the Flickr photo page or Flickr Hacks thread: http://www.flickr.com/photos/fjordaan/5024220354/ http://www.flickr.com/groups/flickrhacks/discuss/72157625032814264/
